verses.verse: And I <S%G3708>saw<s%> an <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G2597>coming<s%> <S%G2597>down<s%> from <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> the <S%G2807>key<s%> of the <S%G12>abyss<s%> and a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G254>chain<s%> in his <S%G5495>hand.<s%>

And he <S%G2902>laid<s%> <S%G2902>hold<s%> of the <S%G1404>dragon,<s%> the <S%G3789>serpent<s%> of <S%G744>old,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> is the <S%G1228>devil<s%> and <S%G4567>Satan,<s%> and <S%G1210>bound<s%> him for a <S%G5507>thousand<s%> <S%G2094>years,<s%>

and <S%G906>threw<s%> him into the <S%G12>abyss,<s%> and <S%G2808>shut<s%> [it] and <S%G4972>sealed<s%> [it] <S%G1883>over<s%> him, <S%G2443>so<s%> that he should not <S%G4105>deceive<s%> the <S%G1484>nations<s%> <S%G2089>any<s%> <S%G2089>longer,<s%> <S%G891>until<s%> the <S%G5507>thousand<s%> <S%G2094>years<s%> were <S%G5055>completed;<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> he <S%G1163>must<s%> be <S%G3089>released<s%> for a <S%G3398>short<s%> <S%G5550>time.<s%>

And I <S%G3708>saw<s%> <S%G2362>thrones,<s%> and they <S%G2523>sat<s%> upon them, and <S%G2917>judgment<s%> was <S%G1325>given<s%> to them. And I [saw] the <S%G5590>souls<s%> of <S%G3588>those<s%> who had been <S%G3990>beheaded<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> of the <S%G3141>testimony<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> and <S%G1223>because<s%> of the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> and those <S%G3748>who<s%> had not <S%G4352>worshiped<s%> the <S%G2342>beast<s%> <S%G3761>or<s%> his <S%G1504>image,<s%> and had not <S%G2983>received<s%> the <S%G5480>mark<s%> upon their <S%G3359>forehead<s%> and upon their <S%G5495>hand;<s%> and they came to <S%G2198>life<s%> and <S%G936>reigned<s%> with <S%G5547>Christ<s%> for a <S%G5507>thousand<s%> <S%G2094>years.<s%>

The <S%G3062>rest<s%> of the <S%G3498>dead<s%> did not come to <S%G2198>life<s%> <S%G891>until<s%> the <S%G5507>thousand<s%> <S%G2094>years<s%> were <S%G5055>completed.<s%> <S%G3778>This<s%> is the <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G386>resurrection.<s%>

<S%G3107>Blessed<s%> and <S%G40>holy<s%> is the one who <S%G2192>has<s%> a <S%G3313>part<s%> in the <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G386>resurrection;<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> the <S%G1208>second<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G1849>power,<s%> but they will be <S%G2409>priests<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> and of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> and will <S%G936>reign<s%> with Him for a <S%G5507>thousand<s%> <S%G2094>years.<s%>
And <S%G3752>when<s%> the <S%G5507>thousand<s%> <S%G2094>years<s%> are <S%G5055>completed,<s%> <S%G4567>Satan<s%> will be <S%G3089>released<s%> from his <S%G5438>prison,<s%>

and will <S%G1831>come<s%> out to <S%G4105>deceive<s%> the <S%G1484>nations<s%> which are in the <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G1137>corners<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> <S%G1136>Gog<s%> and <S%G3098>Magog,<s%> to <S%G4863>gather<s%> them <S%G4863>together<s%> for the <S%G4171>war;<s%> the <S%G706>number<s%> of them is <S%G5613>like<s%> the <S%G285>sand<s%> of the <S%G2281>seashore.<s%>

And they <S%G305>came<s%> up on the <S%G4114>broad<s%> <S%G4114>plain<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth<s%> and <S%G2943>surrounded<s%> the <S%G3925>camp<s%> of the <S%G40>saints<s%> and the <S%G25>beloved<s%> <S%G4172>city,<s%> and <S%G4442>fire<s%> <S%G2597>came<s%> <S%G2597>down<s%> from <S%G3772>heaven<s%> and <S%G2719>devoured<s%> them.

And the <S%G1228>devil<s%> who <S%G4105>deceived<s%> them was <S%G906>thrown<s%> into the <S%G3041>lake<s%> of <S%G4442>fire<s%> and <S%G2303>brimstone,<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> the <S%G2342>beast<s%> and the <S%G5578>false<s%> <S%G5578>prophet<s%> are <S%G2532>also;<s%> and they will be <S%G928>tormented<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> and <S%G3571>night<s%> <S%G165>forever<s%> and <S%G165>ever.<s%>

And I <S%G3708>saw<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G3022>white<s%> <S%G2362>throne<s%> and Him who <S%G2521>sat<s%> upon it, from <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G4383>presence<s%> <S%G1093>earth<s%> and <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G5343>fled<s%> <S%G5343>away,<s%> and <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G5117>place<s%> was <S%G2147>found<s%> for them.

And I <S%G3708>saw<s%> the <S%G3498>dead,<s%> the <S%G3173>great<s%> and the <S%G3398>small,<s%> <S%G2476>standing<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> the <S%G2362>throne,<s%> and <S%G975>books<s%> were <S%G455>opened;<s%> and <S%G243>another<s%> <S%G975>book<s%> was <S%G455>opened,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> is [the book] of <S%G2222>life;<s%> and the <S%G3498>dead<s%> were <S%G2919>judged<s%> from the things which were <S%G1125>written<s%> in the <S%G975>books,<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to their <S%G2041>deeds.<s%>

And the <S%G2281>sea<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> up the <S%G3498>dead<s%> which were in it, and <S%G2288>death<s%> and <S%G86>Hades<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> up the <S%G3498>dead<s%> which were in them; and they were <S%G2919>judged,<s%> <S%G1538>every<s%> <S%G1538>one<s%> [of them] <S%G2596>according<s%> to their <S%G2041>deeds.<s%>

And <S%G2288>death<s%> and <S%G86>Hades<s%> were <S%G906>thrown<s%> into the <S%G3041>lake<s%> of <S%G4442>fire.<s%> <S%G3778>This<s%> is the <S%G1208>second<s%> <S%G2288>death,<s%> the <S%G3041>lake<s%> of <S%G4442>fire.<s%>

And <S%G1487>if<s%> anyone's name was not <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G1125>written<s%> in the <S%G976>book<s%> of <S%G2222>life,<s%> he was <S%G906>thrown<s%> into the <S%G3041>lake<s%> of <S%G4442>fire.<s%>
